2.content:

Highest Battle Power record reached

It is a comprehensive value that integrates the current battle power of the role.
[gIn the game Battle Power is sometimes abbreviated as BP]

5.content:
[yRecommended Defense:]
The recommended physical and magical defense values for combat adventure in the current scene. If the strength is lower than the recommended defense, the battle will be very dangerous.

6.content:

The scraps obtained through equipment decomposition can be used by blacksmiths in each main city for equipment synthesis.

15.content:
1.For each successful purchase, the market will take [g10%] cut of the item from the purchaser (Half after activating Wealth Privilege). Less than [g1] Gem will be considered as [g1] Gem, the maximum amount is 200 Gems. 
2.You can easily find the item you want by using search and filter functions.
3.You can purchase [oLegendary Equipment] when your character gets to level [g60].

16.content:
1.[gSkill Book], [gOrb], unidentified [gEquipment] can be sold.
2.The sale of items needs to deduct the corresponding handling fee according to the time. The longer the sale time, the more the handling fee.

17.content:
1.All items sold by oneself are displayed in [gMy shelf].
2.Retrieving items that are currently on sale can be cancelled, and items that have been off the shelf are retrieved from the shelf.
3.Items retrieved manually, The handling fee will not be refunded.

84.content:
[y规则说明:]
1.每[g充值{@1:}元宝]可获得1张[g传奇奖券]，每日最多可得[g300张]；
2.每[g消耗{@2:}元宝]可获得1张[g屠龙奖券]，每日最多可得[g300张]；
3.每次抽奖需消耗传奇、屠龙奖券[g各一张]；
4.活动每日[g0点]关闭，清空当日未使用的奖券，需再次充值才能参加活动。

85.content:
[y强化说明:]
1.强化消耗羽毛和羽灵；
2.羽灵可通过翼灵神殿击杀BOSS获得；
3.翼灵需要获得对应的翅膀才可以进行强化，其中翼灵1-4级需要四阶翅膀，5-8级需要七阶翅膀，9-13级需要十阶翅膀；
4.当所有翼灵等级达到4级或以上，可以获得1级神鸟跟随身旁，达到8级或以上获得2级神鸟，全部达到12级获得3级神鸟。

86.content:

2.每天最多可[g聚宝十次]，每抽一次随机抽中一件物品，已抽中的[g奖励不再重复获得]；
3.每日[g0点刷新]，[g请及时聚宝抽奖]，避免不必要的损失。

2.单笔充值奖励每周最多可[g领奖21次]，次数每周刷新，未领取的奖励[g重置时清除]。

93.content:
[yHighest Orb Power:]
Highest Orb Power record reached
[yCurrent Orb Power:]
1.The sum of all the powers of the orb currently equipped.
2.[bOrb] can use [gObsidian] to cultivate and improve, The degree of improvement is determined by [gTalent].
3.[b【Artisan】] can appraise [gOrb Casket], [gOrb Casket] has 3 types of rarity: Rare, Epic, and Unique.
[gIn the game Orb Power is sometimes abbreviated as OP]

95.content:
[y离线场景设置]：
1.[b离线场景]：通过[y回收特权]激活[y离线特权]，角色可设置[b离线场景]，离线期间获得[b多倍经验时间]和[yBoss加速时间]。
2.[b多倍经验时间]：角色离线后，再次上线获得离线时间，该时间内获得多倍杀怪经验，自动生效至消耗完毕，累计上限为[g16]小时。
3.[yBoss加速时间]：角色离线后，再次上线获得离线时间，该时间可用于加速[b离线场景]Boss复活，需手动加速，累计上限为[g16]小时。
4.每次加速Boss复活至Boss再次出现，不足一次[yBoss加速]则按最大时间抵消刷新时间。
5.角色离线时，已被设置的[b离线场景]Boss状态将被冻结，至下次上线后自动激活。
6.更换[b离线场景]，则清空已有[yBoss加速时间]，并重新计时下次新设定场景的[y加速时间]，多倍经验时间不受该操作影响。未设置[b离线场景]的玩家，首次设置不清空[yBoss加速时间]。

96.content:
1.The fully automatic agent can free your hands and work even after you close the game.
2.You can choose 20 Bosses in total, and it is hosted offline for up to 24 hours.
3.After checking the box of Boss list, your role will automatically kill the Boss in descending order of Limit BP. You can change the order to ascending order at the bottom.
4.Checking Automatic purchases can avoid the insufficient potions problem. Potions in Auto-purchase will line up with the potions you chose in system settings.
5.Checking Automatic purchases can avoid the insufficient potions problem. Auto-purchase potions are line up with the potions your chose in settings.
6.Automatically teleport to the main city when you die, and set off again after a short stay.
7.Please check the Boss reasonably within the scope of your role ability, improper selection may slow down your farming speed.
8.You can get the loot after you log in, and you will lose the items if your inventory is full. Check the automatic recycling settings before you go offline.
[r9.Please be aware that the hosted assistant is role bound service，it doesn't work on other roles of your account.]

97.content:
[yTemple of Elements]:
1.[bOpening Condition]: Player level ≥ [g50] level. 
2.[bTemple of Elements]: It is composed of multiple layers of [yTemple of Fire], [yTemple of Ice], [y Temple of Thunder], [yTemple of Poison], and random challenges [g3] times a day. 
3.[bTeam]: Players create challenge teams, which can be hired and assist other players. 
4. Each day can be hired and assisted [g3] times. 
5. [bEnergy] Reaching the target can trigger the Boss in advance. 
6.Kill the boss within the countdown to get [rExtra Reward], And can [rpraise] teammates based on help evaluation. 
7. Each scene consists of [g50] layers.

100.content:
[yRule description:]
1.Registration time: [g0:00-19:00]; Registration costs [g100] [yUntradeable Gems] and you can get [g100] [pBet Chips]
2.When the number of applicants reaches 10 or more. There will have at least [g5] matches. All applicants have a chance to be picked as a fighter in a game.
3.Guessing time: [g19:00-22:00]. Applicants can spend [g10] Chips to [rbet] or [rraise] on a fighter to win.
4.The match results will be displayed from [g22:00-24:00] every day(depends on the number of applicants). The event will record the last 4 days' match results.
5.Reward delivery time: [g22:00-22:30](depends on the number of applicants). Fighters who win the match will receive a Match Pack. Applicants who win the guess will get Bet points depending on the Chips you bet. You can claim the rewards in the mailbox.

101.content:
1. Each transcend requires the consumption of the [gsame type] of minor orb 
2. After transcendence, the minor orb will [rdisappear] 
3. After transcendence, the talent attributes of the main orb will have a chance to [gincrease] or [rdecrease] 
4. You can tap on the main orb and the minor orb to select the replace (Equipped orbs can not be used as the minor orb) 
5. When the talent of 3 attributes are higher than [g2.0]/[g2.2]/[g2.4]/[g2.6]/[g2.8], the orb can be advanced.

102.content:
The skills have 4 attributes: [rFire], [bIce], [yThunder] and [gPoison], and are strengthened by the damage of the corresponding element orbs. Some skills in the battle will have the following effects:
[bFreezing]: attack speed and movement speed reduced
[rBurning]: decreases accuracy and inflicts burning damage over time
[yLightning]: unable to move, unable to attack
[gPoisoning]: takes poison damage over time
